name: Prototype: Time X Time
description:
A prototype was made in Cocos Creator for the subject "Rapid Prototyping".

The theme for this projects was "Time and not Time"

Instructions:

Accumulate points by shooting the balls of your color.

Shoot in your color to score 1 point and add 3 seconds to your timer.

Shoot the enemy color to add 3 seconds to the enemy.

When the clocks have a difference of 10 seconds the game ends and the player with the most points wins.

Controlls:

P1:

S: Shoot Up

D: Shoot forward

P2:

J: Shoot Up

K: Shoot forward
